short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser extension for Chrome and Firefox that allows you to open a side panel to browse the web while you work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# side browser 1.0.11
## Changelog
- Support Drag & drop URL/Link to open it in sideview

# side browser 1.0.10
## Changelog
- Adjustment of UI

# side browser 1.0.8
## Changelog
- Adjustment of UI details
- Focused mode is supported

# side browser 1.0.7
## Changelog
- Adjustment of UI details

# side browser 1.0.6
## Changelog
- New: Support for adding shortcuts
- Adjustment of UI details

# side browser 1.0.5
## Changelog
- Adjustment of UI details

# side browser 1.0.4
## Changelog
- Fixed the problem that some websites could not be opened in iframes, such as ChatGPT, Google, and so on.

# side browser 1.0.3
## Changelog
- Added the ability to open SideBrowser via right-click.

# side browser 1.0.2
## Changelog
- Added new data.
- Open in new window for websites not supported by iframe.

# side browser 1.0.1
## Changelog
- Browse webpages in the sidebar.
- Support entering URLs.
- Support remembering the last visited webpage.
- Support opening in new window.
- Support opening bookmarks.
